thread.title_full: One of my favorite Ibis hotel - Review of Ibis London Euston St Pancras, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Sandradot
title: One of my favorite Ibis hotel
text: Stayed here fore three nights. Literally across from train station, good breakfast selection, nice bar area. Easy check in and out. Room was clean and beds were comfortable. Even had a bathtub. Typical Ibis room but was quiet even though hotel seemed quite full.
